changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: update FKT_VOUCHERITEMS vi set ITEMVOUCHERTYPE = (select v.VOUCHERTYPE from FKT_VOUCHERS v where vi.FK_VOUCHER = v.ID)

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TMP_FKT_CONT SELECT c2.ID FROM FKT_CONTACT c1, FKT_CONTACT c2 WHERE c1.FK_ALTERNATECONTACT = c2.ID AND c2.CUSTOMERNUMBER IS NULL
UPDATE FKT_CONTACT SET CONTACTTYPE=1 WHERE ID in (SELECT ID FROM TMP_FKT_CONT)
